applicability_reasoning: This regulation clearly applies to the pension scheme rules document for several reasons: 1) The document is produced by AIB life, which is a regulated financial services provider ('Saol Assurance d.a.c., trading as AIB life, is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland'). 2) The document contains information about a financial product (pension life cover scheme) that is provided to consumers and intermediaries. 3) The document's structure and content demonstrates efforts to enable consumer understanding through clear definitions, organized sections, and explanatory text - which aligns with the regulation's requirement for information to be 'designed to readily enable consumer understanding'. 4) The document includes specific sections aimed at explaining the product to the target market, including 'How Does The Scheme Work?', 'Scheme Benefits', and detailed definitions. 5) The document appears to be part of a formal product documentation process, which relates to the regulation's requirement for incorporating consumer understanding into 'product and service design' processes.
regulation_title: Product producers to ensure that information enables consumer understanding
regulation_text: 65. A product producer shall - (a) ensure that the information, including documentation, which it provides when producing, manufacturing or packaging a product of a financial or investment nature - (i) to consumers, and 10 OJ L 165, 18.6.2013, p. 63 (ii) to intermediaries where the information, including documentation, is required to be provided to intermediaries for the purpose of those intermediaries providing it to consumers, is designed to readily enable consumer understanding having regard to the target market for that product, (b) ensure that the requirement referred to in paragraph (a) is incorporated into the product producer's processes for product and service design, and (c) have in place a process to regularly review, test and monitor the effectiveness of the information and documentation referred to in paragraph (a) in order to comply with the requirement referred to in that paragraph.
